Extends the Signals mod with components that interact with the Electrical Progressive mod.

Electrical Progressive
EP switch
A switch controlled by a signal. Allows switching the transmission of electric current on or off.
If a signal is present at the input, the switch is on. If there is no signal at the input, the switch is off.
EP meter
Allows obtaining information about the state of the electrical network to which the meter is connected.
If signal 1 is present at the input, the output signal shows the battery charge level in the network.
If signal 2 is present at the input, the output signal shows the production/consumption balance of electricity. Values 1-7: consumption exceeds production, 8: consumption=production, 9-15: electricity production exceeds consumption.
If another signal is present at the input, the output is 0.
